name: dotclaude-plugins
description: Revolutionary AI interaction platform featuring cognitive orchestration, adaptive learning, development workflows, and meta-cognitive analysis. Transform Claude Code into an advanced cognitive amplification system.

plugins.description: Maximum cognitive diversity orchestration with multi-expert collaboration, structured disagreement, and breakthrough thinking protocols.

plugins.name: adaptive-learning
plugins.description: Transformative learning through scaffolded discovery, Socratic methodology, and adaptive teaching that adjusts to learner sophistication in real-time.

plugins.description: Production-ready development workflows with TDD orchestration, feature development, security hardening, and 100+ specialized technical agents.

plugins.name: insight-engine
plugins.description: Meta-cognitive analysis through assumption auditing, knowledge synthesis, and pattern discovery for breakthrough thinking.

plugins.name: personalities
plugins.description: Multi-persona analysis framework using split-team principles with cognitive harmonics, productive disagreement, and 7 specialized persona agents for multidimensional problem solving.

plugins.name: infra-pipeline
plugins.description: Complete infrastructure lifecycle from IaC to deployment. Master AWS, Terraform, CI/CD pipelines, GitOps workflows, and deployment automation.

plugins.name: observability-ops
plugins.description: Production reliability and observability. Master Datadog, CloudWatch, monitoring, incident response, SRE practices, and audit logging.

plugins.name: frontend-excellence
plugins.description: Modern React and UI development. Master React 19, Next.js 15, component architecture, state management, and performance optimization.

plugins.name: backend-security
plugins.description: Backend development with security-first approach. Master REST/GraphQL APIs, OWASP security, LLM integration, and authentication systems.

plugins.name: data-intelligence
plugins.description: Data engineering and time series analysis. Expert in jq, SQL, pandas, time series forecasting, ETL pipelines, and analytics.

plugins.name: queue-orchestrator
plugins.description: Message queues and distributed systems. Master queue theory, RabbitMQ, SQS, Kafka, async processing, and backpressure.

plugins.name: ux-product
plugins.description: User-centered design and product excellence. Master user research, UX design, accessibility, product strategy, and journey mapping.

plugins.name: project-delivery
plugins.description: Project orchestration from planning to delivery. Master Scrum, Kanban, sprint planning, roadmaps, and stakeholder management.

plugins.name: cli-mastery
plugins.description: Command-line excellence and Unix wizardry. Expert in shell scripting, Unix pipelines, text processing, and CLI tool composition.

plugins.name: interview-assist
plugins.description: Master Staff+ and Principal level interviews. Comprehensive interview preparation with coding, system design, behavioral coaching, side-effects engineering, technical communication, leadership scenarios, and realistic mock interviews.
